<title level="1" right="Rules">[Inclines](/Rules.aspx?ID=457)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 476 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An incline is an area so steep that you need to Climb using the Athletics skill in order to progress upward. You’re flat-footed when Climbing an incline.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
